archetype.title: Single-module Application Project (vaadin-archetype-application)
archetype.description: A template for a simple Vaadin application. Puts everything in one module.

archetype.title: Multi-module Application Project (vaadin-archetype-application-multimodule)
archetype.description: A template for a more complex Vaadin project. Separates deployment, UI and widgetset into separate Maven modules.

archetype.title: Add-on Project (vaadin-archetype-widget)
archetype.description: A multi-module widget add-on project for creating a re-usable Vaadin component, including a demo application. Packages the add-on in a format ready to be deployed to Vaadin Directory.

archetype.title: CRUD Example (vaadin-archetype-application-example)
archetype.description: A multi-module example CRUD (create/read/update/delete) application containing a login screen, basic access control examples and more. Provides a good example on how you can structure a Vaadin application.
